摉摉摉

摉字的基本解释

摉
sōu
古同“搜”：“闭门闾，大摉客。”

摉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sōu］
［《廣韻》所鳩切，平尤，生。］
亦作“摉1”。亦作“1”。亦作“蓃1”。亦作“騪1”。
(1)搜索；搜查。
(2)寻求；找出。
(3)聚集。
(4)清除，消除。
(5)萧疏貌。参见“搜寥”。
(6)清冷貌。
(7)象声词。
(8)通“獀”。春天打猎。
[②]［shǎo］
［《集韻》山巧切，上巧，生。］
(1)扰乱。参见“搜2攪”。
(2)搅和，拌和。
[③]［xiāo］
［《集韻》先彫切，平蕭，心。］
见“搜3搜”。

摉字的康熙字典解释
摉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
摉字的起名意思

暂无。

Fen
Basic explanation of words
Fen
sōu
Gu Tong's "search": "Closed door, big infatuation."
Fen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sōu]
["Guangyun" was cut, Pingyou, and born. ]
Also known as "Fang 1". Also known as "1". Also known as "蓃1". Also known as "騪1".
(1) Search; search.
(2) Seek; find out.
(3) Gathering.
(4) Clear, eliminate.
(5) Xiao Shu appearance. See "Sou Liao".
(6) Cool appearance.
(7) Onomatopoeia.
(8) Through "獀". Hunting in spring.
[②]［shǎo］
["Ji Yun" Shan Qiao cut, Shang Qiao, raw. ]
(1) Disturbance. See "Search 2 stir".
(2) Stir and mix.
[③] [xiāo]
["Ji Yun" first carved and cut, Ping Xiao, heart. ]
See "Search 3 Search".
